snippet.title: Motorbike rider fights for life in Qld
snippet.content: A motorbike rider is fighting for life after losing control and smashing into another vehicle south of the Queensland Gold Coast. The rider was travelling south on the Pacific Motorway near Burleigh Heads when he lost control of the bike and collided with the rear end of another vehicle. The rider sustained serious, life-threatening injuries as a result of the incident and was taken to the Gold Coast University Hospital in a critical condition. The driver of the vehicle is assisting police with their inquiries. Originally published as
